questions.title: Dose by weight
questions.stem: A child weighs 18 kg. The prescribed dose is 0.15 mg/kg. What is the total dose in mg?
questions.hint: Multiply the weight by the dose per kg.
questions.explanation: SafeMedicate-style: accept 2.7 mg; 2.70 is also fine.

questions.title: Dose by weight (adult)
questions.stem: An adult weighs 72 kg. The prescription is 1.2 mg/kg. Calculate the total dose in mg.
